author: mirichmo
body:
Fixes #2342 and #2346 
1. I added an additional sanity check to the JSON file processing during reads to better handle empty files such as "{}".
2. I Refactored the ExecutionPolicy tests to centralize them in the new location, remove duplication, and handle windows vs. non-windows execution using the new try-catch technique.
